channel.itunes:summary:
Real Estate Video Tours featuring vacation rental properties in Deep Creek Maryland, presented by Taylor-Made.
Welcome to Deep Creek Lake, where you will fall in love with the area and community as the Taylor family did in 1987, when we first began vacationing here at the lake. Or perhaps you are a longtime resident of the area as the Refosco family has been since 1984. We have combined our knowledge and experience and formed a new property management company: Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations. At Deep Creek Lake, Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations is family-owned and operated to specialize in providing the most memorable family vacations. Our reservationist staff place guests in dream vacation homes every day of the year. Our knowledgeable and caring staff is dedicated to provide you with the best customer service to ensure the most of your vacation. We guarantee we will tackle any request, no matter how big or how small, with a smile. With the immense growth in the area, Deep Creek Lake is in need of a new and experienced property management company with innovative ideas. We have a combined twenty-five years of experience in the property management industry. Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations’ top grade service and high standards will allow us to provide every vacationer their special dream home. Experience does make a difference, as you will see when you let Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations create your worry-free vacation!
For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

item.itunes:summary:
Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Rocky Top.
Planning your perfect mountain getaway? Then Rocky Top is the home for you. Tucked away at the end of a cul-de-sac, this home offers privacy but is still only a short drive away from all boisterous lake activities. Imagine spending the evening soaking in the hot tub while gazing up at the celestial night sky. A perfect way to relax after a playful day tubing on the lake or snow tubing at Wisp. Grab a mug of coffee and head out to the large covered front porch where you can lounge lazily while breathing in the crisp morning air. Enjoy watching the wildlife scamper around as you take in the magnificent view of Mother Nature at her finest.
The exquisitely decorated great room is the ideal gathering place. Light a fire, relax on the overstuffed sofa with a good book or pop in a movie for a relaxing night in. There is plenty of room here for the whole group to spread out. Kids and adults alike will fall in love with the lower level family room, where they can join in a playful game of foosball or catch the game on the large TV. The state of the art kitchen will surely please the chef in the family. With its gorgeous granite counter tops and overly stocked cabinets, meal preparation has never been easier. Family and friends will be sure to enjoy mealtime as they gather around the large dining room table.
You will rest easily in the ample king-sized bed, and the simple yet elegant décor is sure to please. The comfortable mattresses, fresh clean linens, and sumptuous comforters will allow you to sleep peacefully. Away from the bustling sounds of the city, you and your guests will be amazed at how easily you can drift away after a long day of play. Looking for some quiet alone time? Fill up the over-sized jetted tub and prepare yourself for a nice long soak. Therapy 101 at your fingertips! Quiet, comfortable, yet luxuriously furnished, Rocky Top, will exceed your highest expectations. Call today to plan the ultimate mountain getaway that you have always dreamed of.
For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

item.itunes:summary: Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Waterfront Links. Welcome to vacation paradise. Waterfront Links. This exquisite, 5 bedroom home with a private pool is the ideal home for your family and friends. The immaculate, beautifully landscaped home is located in the prestigious community of Waterfront Greens, where you have access to all of its amenities. Mini-golf, tennis, a catch & release pond, and a breathtaking 3 par golf course are all at your finger tips. The private indoor pool will provide hours of endless fun for everyone. Parents will love the convenient yet tastefully decorated additional furnishings in the pool room, which provides the perfect atmosphere for relaxation while the kids splash in the water. The bright yet cozy Great Room will be a favorite place to hang with your friends. The gas fireplace, large flat screen TV, and extremely comfortable furnishings provide a space where memories will surely be made. Worried about space? Don't be, as your family will absolutely fall in love with the additional Family Room. Cue up your stick and engage in a playful game of billiards or catch "The Game" on the wide screen TV. The extra refrigerator, wet bar, and seating make for a pleasant area for all to enjoy. The gorgeous built in gas fireplace will provide the perfect ambiance of tranquility in the winter time. The kitchen, complete with gorgeous granite countertops & beautiful hardwood floors, is not only fully stocked, but boasts of an inviting floor plan. While the chef in the family works his or her magic preparing meals, the rest of the gang can rest comfortably in the dining area or additional sitting space. Plan tomorrow's trip to ASCI or perhaps a picnic at Swallow Falls State Park for your daily agenda. With 5 master suites, Waterfront Links is the ideal home for a couple's retreat. Each bedroom has been elegantly decorated with you, the renter, in mind. Large king sized beds, crisp clean linens, and plush, soft comforters ensure a restful nights sleep for all in this wonderful home. The enclosed deck is the perfect place for your morning coffee. Step away for a moment of solitude, relax, and take in the beauty of the lake before you. Summer is meant for barbecues, and the large deck off the house sets the perfect space to do just this. Afterwards, take a short stroll down the path behind the house to your slip dock where you can take a refreshing dip in the lake. Waterfront Greens is not only a stunning home brimming with all of the amenities, but it is just a short drive away from all lake activities and restaurants. Located in a wonderful community, this home is waiting for you and your loved ones. Call today to reserve Waterfront Links. For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

item.itunes:summary: Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Angler's Cove. Do you need to get away from the rigorous demands of city life? Then escape to Angler's Cove, a quaint and beautiful 3 bedroom lakefront cottage located on the western end of the Deep Creek Lake. Appropriately named for its fantastic fishing area, Angler's Cove comes with its own private dock. What better way to beat the summer heat than spending your days swimming and water tubing? Even the family dog won't be able to resist a refreshing dip in the lake. Dock your boat or rent one locally - you will get to witness the stunning beauty of the lake and surrounding mountains from a whole new perspective. In the evening, relax and renew as you take a soak in the the bubbling hot tub. Covered by a stunning gazebo, you will love the serenity of nature that surrounds you. Once inside, you will connect with your nostalgic self as you step back in time to embrace the old lakefront cottage charm. Combining the wonderful characteristics of knotty pine, large wooden vaulted beams, and a grand stone fireplace, the great room will be a favorite place to gather for the whole family. The expansive floor plan allows ample room for everyone to spread out. The kids will enjoy watching a movie or playing board games in the sunny sitting area just off of the great room. Guests will also enjoy the lower level where they can partake in a friendly game of competitive billiards. With a brilliant wood-fire burning in the fireplace, winter nights will certainly be cozy and warm. Meal time is the perfect opportunity to bring friends & family together, which is easily done in this charismatic and well-stocked kitchen. Whether you are serving a gourmet meal or a simple breakfast, having everyone join together around the country accented dining table will create memories for a lifetime. Each bedroom is rich in detail and accentuates the comforting cottage feel of the home. Crisp clean sheets and billowy comforters ensure a restful nights sleep for all. Morning or evening, you will love taking advantage of the two mile walking / hiking trail that borders the waterfront of the home. Imagine spending your every morning and evening embracing the fresh mountain air. It's time to get away. Call today to reserve your stay at Angler's Cove! For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

item.itunes:summary: Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Enchantment. At the end of a quiet gravel lane, nestled amongst the trees, the home “Enchantment” awaits your arrival. Like past guests, you will quickly become "enchanted" with this stunning three bedroom Tennessee log home. Imagine lazy winter afternoons gathered in the great room. A warm, inviting fire sets the backdrop as you and your family lounge comfortably on the plush leather sofa and watch the snowflakes fall gently to the ground from the large open windows. With three levels of living space, there is more than ample space for everyone in your party to spread out. The lower level family room is an ideal area for the gang to catch the big game on the wide flat screen TV. The newly decorated billiards area is newly accentuated with an exquisite wooden bar. It provides a vibrant, fun atmosphere for spending an evening indoors. Still unsure of how to spend your day? Head over to the theatre room to catch a new release on the big screen, or host a rousing card game at the poker table. The fully stocked kitchen is rich in detail and features elegant hardwood floors, and is sure to please the chef in the family. The dining area not only offers plenty of seating, but boasts beautiful views of the woodlands that surround you. Not only does each bedroom have its own TV, but they will captivate your senses with gorgeous country bedding, knotted pine & groove wood beams, and walls that compliment the atmosphere. Crisp, clean linens and towels are provided for each stay, ensuring you a restful night’s sleep and a worrisome stay. Ready to partake in some adventurous summertime lake activities? Your very own dock slip is just a mere mile away. Or, enjoy the beach at Deep Creek State Park, which is located on the other side of the cove. After an invigorating day on the slopes, nothing says relaxation like a calming soak in the bubbling outdoor hot tub. Breathe deeply and appreciate the fresh mountain air! Whether its morning or evening, you will simply love spending time outside on the wrap around deck. Privacy is yours, and mother nature will surely not disappoint. Secluded and private, yet minutes away from area dining, shopping, and Wisp Resort, Enchantment boasts of all amenities. Whether you are planning a family getaway or a couple's retreat, Enchantment has everything you need for a blissful getaway. Call today to book your vacation! For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

item.itunes:summary:
Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - No Worries.
Are you in need of an escape from the worries of everyday life? Are you looking for the perfect retreat to enjoy with family or friends? Vacationing in “No Worries” - an exquisite 5 bedroom mountain chalet with a private pool - will guarantee just that. Imagine walking up each morning to the breathtaking view of a sparkling Deep Creek Lake and the surrounding lushness of Wisp Mountain. After a long day of snow tubing and cross country skiing, you will be ready to immerse yourself in the bubbling hot tub and take in the mesmerizing view of the illuminated ski slopes.
The expansive Great Room with its stunning but simple décor provides the ideal area for the family to gather to reminisce over the day’s exciting events. Ready for a bit of friendly competition? Head to the lower level and rack up the pool balls. Combine a billiard table, a large flat screen TV, and a roaring fireplace and you have the perfect way to spend a lazy fall afternoon. Rainy day and nothing to do? Not with this spectacular private indoor swimming pool. Both the kids and adults will love playing and splashing around. Hours of entertainment are waiting for you.
The culinary artist of the family will love the large overly stocked kitchen with gorgeous granite countertops. Family meal times will be made even more memorable with everyone gathered around the large dining room table or eating outside on the large deck to enjoy the fresh the mountain air. You will rest soundlessly at night on the plush king and queen sized beds. Crisp clean linens and lavish comforters adorn the beds adding to your restful slumber.
This home is ideally located in the heart of McHenry. It is within walking distance to area restaurants, miniature golf, and even an arcade. Want to bring your boat or rent one from a local marina? No Worries is a lake access home with a dock slip that is just across the road and an easy stroll away. Stunning décor with breathtaking views, amenities galore including your own private pool, and a convenient location are all awaiting you when you stay in No Worries, your perfect vacation home. Leave your worries at home and call today to book your much deserved getaway!
For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

item.itunes:summary:
Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Claralea Lodge.
Claralea Lodge is an elegant 5 bedroom lakefront log home that is ready to open its doors and welcome you inside. Tucked amidst large pine trees and located in a quiet, serene cove on Deep Creek Lake, you and the family will love spending your time lazily lounging on the private dock.
Located just a short stroll away from the house, this level lakefront is the perfect place to be on hot summer days. Whether you are doing cannonballs off the pier with the kids, taking the boat out for a spin, or trying to reel in the "big one", countless hours of entertainment are here for you. The covered bubbling hot tub will provide much needed relaxation after a day of hiking and mountain biking. Afterwards, head down to the large outdoor fire pit for some old fashioned s'more making.
Gather with guests and family in the expansive Great Room. Spacious and bright, it is the definition of "practical" elegance. Imagine curling up in front of the roaring gas fireplace and watching the gentle falling snowflakes flutter about from the large glass windows. A picture perfect way to spend a cold, winter evening. Gather the kids in the lower level and pop in one of the many dvds available from the dvd library. Looking for something a little more exciting? Challenge a pal to an animated game of air hockey. Guaranteed good times!
The chef in the family will love putting his or her culinary skills to good use in the beautiful overly stocked kitchen. Optimal lighting, top of the line appliances, and gorgeous granite countertops add to the exquisite decor of this room. Whether you’re gathering for a large festive feast or a simple light brunch, there is ample room for everyone around the dining room table. Embrace the fresh mountain air and eat out on the large wraparound deck or have lunch down by the water at the picnic table. Sharing memories of the day, family meal time just took on a whole new meaning.
With three extravagant master suites and comfortable queen sized beds, Claralea Lodge, is also an excellent vacation home for a couple's getaway. Each bedroom is elegantly decorated and has it's own TV. Add to the mix, lovely, plush comforters and clean crisp sheets and you have the perfect combination for a night of peaceful slumber.
Tucked away from the hustle and bustle of things, Claralea Lodge is still conveniently located near area the Wisp Resort area shopping and restaurants. This dazzling home has something to offer everyone in your group no matter what season. Call today to book this magnificent mountain chalet and prepare for the vacation of a lifetime!
For more information, please contact Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations by phone at 866-351-1119, by email at info@deepcreekvacations.com, or visit them online at www.deepcreekvacations.com today.

Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Cedarwoods.
In need of a mountain getaway? Cedarwoods is a beautiful 3 bedroom chalet nestled in the woods and located in the coveted community of Mountainside. After a long day of playing at Wisp Resort, you will truly enjoy spending time in this spectacular Great Room with a fire crackling in the background.

Peaceful sleep will be had by all in this home. Ultra comfortable beds, crisp linens, plush comforters and complete lack of traffic and other outside noises will assure that you sleep peacefully. Awake refreshed and rejuvenated in time to head out on the lake for the day.
Don’t forget to take advantage of the community activities that are available such as the tennis, basketball, and volleyball courts. You will be more than ready to take a soak in the hot tub after a long day of playing. Cedarwoods, your perfect relaxation destination is just a call away. Call today to book this wonderful home!

item.itunes:summary:
Deep Creek Lake Maryland Vacation Rentals - Tranquility.
Long overdue for a relaxing getaway? With a name that promises just that, Tranquility is the perfect home for you. This 4 bedroom home not only boasts exquisite décor, but has a view that will be sure to astound you. The large bubbling hot tub will provide much needed relaxation throughout your stay. Start your day by taking a morning soak and watch as the steam rises from the lake. Does it get any better than this?
With a picturesque fireplace burning in the background, family and friends will love spending time gathered in the Great Room for some lively conversation. Pop some popcorn and let the kids hang out in the lower level family room where they can catch a movie on the large TV. Got your game face on? Head to the lower level for a rousing game of billiards while you catch your favorite sports team on the tube.
Meal time has never been more simple to prepare than in this stately overstocked kitchen. Offering plenty of counter space, makes it a cinch for everyone to chip in and help. Memories will be created as everyone dines around the large dining table. Grilling out? No problem, as the deck access makes it that much easier.
This home is perfect for a couples getaway as the large King and Queen sized beds assure that everyone gets ample sleeping space. Each bedroom is beautifully adorned in eye pleasing colors and elegant decorations. After playing hard all day, don’t forget to relax and soak yourself in the inviting, oversized Hot tub.

It's just minutes from anything and everything...you'll truly be amazed at how worry-free your vacation is. Sit down. Relax. We'll take care of all the little details. item.itunes:summary:
A real estate video tour featuring Memory Lane - 941 Mountainview Drive, Oakland MD 21550.
Property Description: Chad Taylor of Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations presents Memory Lane - 941 Mountainview Drive, Oakland MD 21550.
Memory Lane received its name from the gracious, huge trees and beautifully maintained lawn which give you the comfort of home with all the amenities of community surroundings. Accommodating up to 12 people with it’s 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths, Memory Lane will be sure to send you home with memories to last a life-time. Whether it be friends, family, or new acquaintances, the exquisite décor and conveniently designed interior will welcome every guest with friendly hospitality unmatchable in this area
The generous yard can be viewed from almost every area of the home to keep an eye on the fun in store for the children: playing in the snow or a game of hide and go seek! Take a dip in the hot tub to soothe your muscles or play a game of pool in the large family room. Nearby activities include basketball, volleyball and a picnic pavilion for use at your discretion. Within two miles, you’ll find an array of restaurants, unique shops and a movie theater for your fun and pleasure. On down the road…skiing, golf and Garrett Counties’ wondrous state parks await your visit.
All of the bedrooms are perfectly suited for you and your family's enjoyment. There's plenty of space for everyone to find comfort, serenity and relaxation. The master bath is the ultimate retreat, and it features a luxurious tub for you to enjoy. The gorgeous deck's hot tub is completely inviting and offers a spectacular view off of the deck. There is even a fire pit awaiting you, which is perfect for night-time gatherings in the great outdoors.
The docks - along with this beautiful lake view - are only a short drive away. There are even tennis courts awaiting your next game, and a basketball court for a little friendly family competition. Experience the vacation of a lifetime in Memory Lane!

Property Description: Chad Taylor of Taylor-Made Deep Creek Vacations presents Wild Rose - 810 White Oak Drive, Swanton MD 21561.
Wild Rose is a newly built home located on a flat, lake-front lawn that encourages walk-in swimming in the peaceful cove, without the roar of motor boats or jet skis interrupting the serene environment. The Type A dock allows you to enjoy some great fishing right off the dock or bring your own boat to keep there during your vacation.
This property features a novel, covered deck with a gorgeous lake view from each of its king-sized bedrooms, granite countertops, and four sitting areas for the whole family to relax. The 50" Plasma TV with HD DirecTV in the great room will please the sports enthusiasts, while other family members can enjoy a quiet cup of coffee and favorite book in one of the other sitting areas. Take a dip under the stars in the large hot tub that sits on the lower level patio and looks out into the lake.
Or maybe try relaxing in one of the two over-sized Jacuzzi tubs or indulge yourself in one of the two steam showers. Wild Rose accommodates up to ten people in this quiet 5 bedroom 5.5 bath home with four master suites, and boasts 3 fireplaces - perfect for you to warm up and enjoy your company.
Even though Wild Rose is tucked away from all the hustle and bustle it is only minutes from area activities such as shopping, golf, spas, horseback riding, and great restaurants. Once you've experienced the exquisite comfort of this 'Wild Rose', you will request a return visit year after year--because quality and serenity go hand in hand.
It's a 'beautiful day in the neighborhood'! Can you say copacetic? Relax! You're on vacation. Let us reserve this Wild Rose for your vacation pleasures. Call today for availability. You'll be glad you did.
